metadata.title: NINE20 | Eastern Philosophy × AI
metadata.description: Your Destiny, Decoded by Data & AI.

hero.title: Your Destiny,
hero.description: Thousands of years of Eastern philosophical wisdom meets hyper-scale AI, delivering destiny analysis crafted exclusively for you.

features.title: Four AI Masters Read Your Destiny
features.description: Each AI Dosa brings a unique personality and expertise, analyzing your Saju from diverse perspectives.

muDosa.name: Mu-Dosa
muDosa.description: The essence of classical Myeongri studies, reimagined with AI. Delivers precise and profound Saju readings.

claudeDosa.name: Claude-Dosa
claudeDosa.description: Data-driven logical analysis that systematically interprets your four pillars of destiny.

gDosa.name: G-Dosa
gDosa.description: Fun, approachable fortune-telling with a modern Gen-Z sensibility.

gemDosa.name: Gem-Dosa
gemDosa.description: Cross-cultural philosophical insights that illuminate your life's direction.

techHighlights.title: Global Standard Tech Architecture
techHighlights.description: Complex Eastern metaphysics, perfectly implemented with modern technology.

calendar.title: Manseryeok Engine
calendar.description: Processes thousands of years of lunar calendar data and solar term calculations in milliseconds.

timezone.title: Global Timezone
timezone.description: Guarantees accurate birth time conversion and Saju calculation from anywhere in the world.

ai.title: Multi-AI Engine
ai.description: Hybrid AI architecture leveraging GPT, Claude, Gemini, and more.

personalization.title: Hyper-Personalized
personalization.description: Precision analysis based on your birth date and time for tailored destiny insights.

footer.description: Eastern Philosophy meets Hyper-scale AI. Your destiny, decoded by data.
